features: 💪【XXL PLUS SIZE】 XXL Size: 24"(61cm) x 5.55"(14.1cm) , Ø 2.48"(6.3cm) Diameter single faucet hole. Unlike other products, we have increased the size and weight of our products. XXL super size design for faster, smoother drainage and faster drying. Upgraded supersize, wider space protection, this means no puddles to clean up & no water spots by the faucet. Give your kitchen sink an effort-saving upgrade!

💪【UPGRADE VERSION】 While other kitchen faucet sink splash guards are made from hard-to-clean fabric that takes a lot of time to dry, Our silicone faucet water catcher for sink is made from 100% silicone, soft and reliable, reusable and durable, won't scratch your utensils, totally safe to use. Our silicone water catchers will catch the water and the water will drain to your sink, so don't worry about the wet fabric mat, or wash the mat and dry it.

💪【MULTIFUNCTION】 It's not only a faucet drying mat, it also a sponge holder for kitchen sink, dish soap tray, dish drying mat. For kitchen: put sponge, dish soap, detergent, brush, and bottle on it. Upgrade the size of the increase, you can put more kitchen small things. Make your sink cleaner. Used as an organizer mat, drain pad. It is a super practical kitchen & bathroom gadgets.

💪【KEEP YOUR COUNTERTOP DRY】 Silicone faucets pad new designed for faucet splash with the draining, upgrading your kitchen sink & bathroom countertop in an effort-saving way! This means never gets soggy, or any water spots by the faucet. You don't need to worry about the water staying on the mat or counter.

💪【DECORATION FOR KITCHEN】 Using these Silicone Faucet Splash Catchers with their gray luxurious, timeless color and seamlessly blends into your home to create perfect Sink Accessories, add a touch of luxury in your kitchen will give your house an amazing makeover and elevate your home decor.
Your faucet with a diameter of less than 2.48 inches. Faucets larger than 2.48 inches in diameter will make the silicone faucet mat uneven after installation.

That there must be no obstructions within a length of at least 11.8 inches on the left and right sides of the faucet. Otherwise there is not enough space to put silicone faucet handle drip catcher tray.
There is at least 0.4 inches from the back of the faucet to the wall. Smaller than 0.4 inches, no space for it.
Not applicable to curved edge, shaped sinks or basins, some sinks with built in water filter and hand soap dispensers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XXL Size Design 3 in 1 Kitchen Sink Splash Guard & Kitchen Sink Organization & Silicone Faucet Drying Mat Have you been looking for sink faucet mats to keep water from splashing on kitchen countertops and bathroom sink faucets?Have you been looking for a multi-functional product that will keep your countertops dry, save countertop space and hold a few kitchen items?The following is our newly designed patented Faucet Mat, It's easy to fit your Kitchen sink, Bathroom, Restroom, Farmhouse or RV base to keep the faucets nearby clean and dry.

Before purchasing, please measure if there is enough space near your faucet for installation, referring to the following. A faucet with a diameter of less than 2.48 inches.That there must be no obstructions within a length of at least 11.8 inches on the left and right sides of the faucet.There is at least 0.4 inches from the back of the faucet to the wall.Not applicable to curved edge, shaped sinks or basins.

HIGH-QUALITY SILICONE MATERIALS KEEP YOUR COUNTERTOP DRY Silicone faucets pad new designed for faucet splash with the draining, upgrading your kitchen sink & bathroom countertop in an effort-saving way! This means never gets soggy, or any water spots by the faucet and sink. You don't need to worry about the water staying on the mat or counter.

AIR DRY IN NO TIME Dries in place so you don't need to spend time wiping down countertops. Coverage large enough to catch any spills, keep countertops dry. Two drainage gaps ensure all the caught water will flow into the sink. XXL PLUS SIZE UPCRADE Upgraded supersize, wider space protection, this means no puddles to clean up & no water spots by the faucet. Upgrade the size of the increase, you can put more kitchen small things. Make your sink cleaner. Used as an organizer mat, drain pad. HIGH COMPATIBILITY Silicone faucet handle drip catcher mat has a 2.48"(MAX) adjustable round hole in the middle to fit most faucets. The foldable design makes it possible to use our pad even if the distance from the outer wall of the faucet to the wall is only 0.4 inches. HEALTH AND SAFETY Safe silicone material, non-toxic and odorless, safe for you, and not crack, or bad smell. Reusable and Durable. Not need to be replaced frequently, just wash with detergent or soap and rinse with water.
They’re not only great for the kitchen sink. Use them in your RV, vanity, or bathroom & rescue yourself the headache of cleaning and organising.

How it Works Free Your Hands Free up your hands, you don't need to wipe the sink counter every time. Keep the sink surface clean and dry. It looks great. Foldable Design The foldable design makes it possible to use our pad even if the distance from the outer wall of the faucet to the wall is only 0.4 inches. Multipurpose Use Can be used as storage dish for some small things such as soap, sponge wipes etc. Specification Material: Silicone Puls Size: 24 x 5.55 inch The Width of the Foldable Part: 1.14inch Middle Hole Diameter: 2.48inch (MAX) Package Includes: 1 x Silicone Sink Faucet Mat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just as hoped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't "drain", but serves a purpose and looks nice
reviews.reviewText: With an undermount sink and granite countertop, I hate having water collect around the faucet every time someone washes hands or does dishes - especially when you can't see it.THE GOOD: I can now see the water collect there and not worry it's going to leave hard water deposits there. When I rinse a cup, but not wash it yet, I like resting it on the mat. Same for a wet sponge, etc. It looks nice, I like it, and am keeping it for that reason. It looks nicer than the towel I kept permanently wrapped around the base of my kitchen faucet.THE NOT SO GOOD: Seriously, why the raised vertical bumplines and tiny drain spouts? Unless you flood the mat, it's flat...nothing "drains" off of it. The raised bumps make it harder to dry off with a towel - which you have to do. But those bump lines make it look a little nice than if they weren't there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as expected! My countertops make it hard to see any water buildup if light isn't shining on it and this helps keep that little section dry. opted for the long one to cover the whole sink. Also gray because most said the black gets ashy after awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could be better
reviews.reviewText: Accidentally ordered the 18" for the kitchen sink, which turned out to be too small. Decided to use it elsewhere. Ordered the 24" for it. The 3 stars are for an average, 4 * for 18", 2 * for 24". The 18" is nicely designed and sloped well. The slope is on the bottom with fins that keep items on top level. The 24" is not sloped at all and the drain tabs are much smaller, both of which causes more standing water. If they had taken the 24" and just extended the ends, it would be at least a 4 or 5 *.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and flimsy. Not effective
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t perform as advertised. So flimsy water goes everywhere. Needs to be of thicker, firmer materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: would I buy this item again absolutely hundred percent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wish it was longer
reviews.reviewText: I love it, I just really wish it was longer. I got the biggest size and it's still too short to expand the length of my sink. Ideally I would love if it was al least four inches longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works way better than i expected
reviews.reviewText: i was skeptical, figuring that enough water would get under the mat from drips down the faucet that it would get icky underneath. but nope! makes a HUGE difference; i've got a sink where the tap is a lever on the side of the faucet, which you have to rotate backwards to get hot water, and of course every time you turn it off with wet hands, or rotate it to get hotter or colder water, drip-drip-drip all over the place, including on the strip of counter behind the sink. this thing catches it all.only things i would change: (1) after using it for a while, some areas are shinier and some are more matte, depending on, say, whether the soap dispenser or a was setting in one place for a while; even after running through the dishwasher and then hand-washing, it's still uneven. (2) i'd like it to be just a wee bit thicker in the back, for better drainage; i put a plastic shim under the back, but it'd be cool to not have to deal with that. but those are minor issues, and overall i'm really pleased.
